ygData.subject: Re: [EQCheats] Re: Everquest Cheats over 30 of them
ygData.msgSnippet: What you failed to mention is your webpage devoted to cheats and hacking in EverQuest is nothing more than an ad.  It doesn t list a single cheat or
ygData.messageBody:
What you failed to mention is your 'webpage devoted to cheats and
hacking in EverQuest' is nothing more than an ad. It doesn't list a
single 'cheat' or 'hack'. To make matters worse, in your attempt to
fool people to your website you provide incomplete information about a
cheat that no longer works. The teaser you give hasn't even been
verified by you? What kind of quality assurance is that from a project
that you're trying to profit from? Feel free to post cheats or bugs,
but please keep this bullshit off the list.

Craig Baldwin wrote:
>
> Ahh..I'll go check it out today and see if it doesn't work anymore
>
> Also, How does everyone feel of hacking. I know it is dangerous
> because Verant is always looking out for that stuff and it could get
> your account banned. My website also has info about how to hack to
> raise items stats, make your character run at SOW speed, ect..
>
> Let me know how you feel about hacking info
>
> Thanks,
>
> Craig
> www.everquestbugs.com
>
> --- In EQCheats@egroups.com, "Treadway, Donald" <dtreadway@a...>
> wrote:
> > This bug was fixed on the last or 2nd to last patch. 7 man groups
> no longer
> > work.
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: Craig Baldwin[SMTP:craigba@v...]
> > > Reply To: EQCheats@egroups.com
> > > Sent: Monday, July 17, 2000 4:47 PM
> > > To: EQCheats@egroups.com
> > > Subject: [EQCheats] Everquest Cheats over 30 of them
> > >
> > > I started a website devoted to cheats and hacking in
> everquest...I'll
> > > post a few over the next few days and see how you like them.
> > >
> > > My website is at http://www.everquestbugs.com
> > >
> > > Here's a grouping bug that lets a 7th member in your group
> > >
> > > This 7th member won't be able to talk in the group but I'm
> > > told that
> > > he will able to read what the other member in the group say.
> This
> > > 7th member will not sure up on the grouping list. Also this 7th
> > > member will gain exp as if he were in the group. I have no tried
> > > this bug so I can't verify that it works but here it goes:
> > >
> > > If you have 6 people in a group have one of them disband
> and
> > > then reinvite him,...then invite the 7th person and have them join
> > > in a
> > > certain order (not sure what order so you might have to play
> around
> > > with this one). This bug was submitted by a member of my website
> and
> > > he himself said that he was in a group with 7 people because at
> one
> > > point the 7th person went link dead and it told the group the he
> went
> > > linkdead.
> > >
> > > Thanks and let me know if you want more cheats or you can just go
> to
> > > my website,
> > >
> > > Craig
> > >
